SEARCH
Package qupath.ext.py4j.core

Class QuPathEntryPoint2

java.lang.Object
qupath.lib.scripting.QP
qupath.lib.gui.scripting.QPEx
qupath.ext.py4j.core.QuPathEntryPoint
qupath.ext.py4j.core.QuPathEntryPoint2
public class QuPathEntryPoint2 extends qupath.ext.py4j.core.QuPathEntryPoint
Entry point for use with a Py4J Gateway. This provides useful methods to work with QuPath from Python.

  • Field Summary

    static byte[]
    getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample)
    Read the first z-slice and first time point of the provided image at the provided downsample and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.
    static byte[]
    getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample, int x, int y, int width, int height)
    Read the first z-slice and first time point of a portion of the provided image at the provided downsample and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.

    • addImageEntry

      public static qupath.lib.projects.ProjectImageEntry<BufferedImage> addImageEntry(qupath.lib.projects.Project<BufferedImage> project, qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, qupath.lib.images.ImageData.ImageType type) throws IOException
      Add an image entry to a project, with a specified image type.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to add the image entry to
      server - the image server to add
      type - the image type, or null (hasImageData() == false)
      Returns:
      the added image entry

      The thumbnail of the entry is refreshed.

      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:

      public static qupath.lib.projects.ProjectImageEntry<BufferedImage> addImage(qupath.lib.projects.Project<BufferedImage> project, String imagePath, qupath.lib.images.ImageData.ImageType type) throws IOException
      Add an image entry to a project, with a specified image type.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to add the image entry to
      imagePath - the image file to add
      type - the image type, or null to use the default
      Returns:
      the added image entry
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading the image file

    • addImage

      public static qupath.lib.projects.ProjectImageEntry<BufferedImage> addImage(qupath.lib.projects.Project<BufferedImage> project, String imagePath) throws IOException
      Add an image entry to a project, with an unknown image type.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to add the image entry to
      Returns:
      the added image entry
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading the image file

    • getImageBytes

      public static byte[] getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample) throws IOException
      Read the first z-slice and first time point of the provided image at the provided downsample and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.
      Parameters:
      server - the image to open
      downsample - the downsample to use when reading the image
      Returns:
      an array of bytes described the requested image with the 'imagej tiff' format
      Throws:
      IOException - when an error occurs while reading the image

    • getImageBytes

      public static byte[] getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample, int x, int y, int width, int height) throws IOException
      Read the first z-slice and first time point of a portion of the provided image at the provided downsample and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.
      Parameters:
      server - the image to open
      downsample - the downsample to use when reading the image
      x - the x-coordinate of the portion of the image to retrieve
      y - the y-coordinate of the portion of the image to retrieve
      width - the width of the portion of the image to retrieve
      height - the height of the portion of the image to retrieve
      Returns:
      an array of bytes described the requested image with the 'imagej tiff' format
      Throws:
      IOException - when an error occurs while reading the image

    • getImageBytes

      public static byte[] getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample, int x, int y, int width, int height, int z, int t) throws IOException
      Read a portion of the provided image at the provided downsample and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.
      Parameters:
      server - the image to open
      downsample - the downsample to use when reading the image
      x - the x-coordinate of the portion of the image to retrieve
      y - the y-coordinate of the portion of the image to retrieve
      width - the width of the portion of the image to retrieve
      height - the height of the portion of the image to retrieve
      z - the z-slice of the image to retrieve
      t - the time point of the image to retrieve
      Returns:
      an array of bytes described the requested image with the 'imagej tiff' format
      Throws:
      IOException - when an error occurs while reading the image

    • getImageBytes

      public static byte[] getImageBytes(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, qupath.lib.regions.RegionRequest request) throws IOException
      Read a portion of the provided image and return an image with the default format 'imagej tiff'.
      Parameters:
      server - the image to open
      request - the region to read.
      Returns:
      an array of bytes described the requested image with the 'imagej tiff' format
      Throws:
      IOException - when an error occurs while reading the image

    • getImageBase64

      public static String getImageBase64(qupath.lib.images.servers.ImageServer<BufferedImage> server, double downsample) throws IOException
      Same as getImageBytes(ImageServer, double), but encoded with the Base64 scheme.
      Throws:
      IOException

      IOException
